title: LastPass - Reporting Events
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of reporting events.

definition.content:
[LastPass](https://www.lastpass.com/products/business) is a password management solution that securely stores and manages passwords and other sensitive
information. LastPass provides users with the ability to generate passwords, synchronize passwords across multiple
devices, and add an extra layer of security through multi-factor authentication.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of reporting events.


**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

search.query: source:lastpass service:reporting-events @Data:"LastPass via Website" @evt.name:"Failed login attempt" $IP_Address $Username
source:lastpass service:reporting-events @Data:"LastPass via Website" @evt.name:"Failed login attempt" $IP_Address $Username

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates reporting events to detect real-time threats happening in your LastPass account. If you don't see any signals, make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).

definition.title: Top IPs with Failed Login Attempts

search.query: source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Restored shared folder" OR "Update folder permissions" OR "Limit shared folder" OR "Removed from shared folder" OR "Add to shared folder" OR "Move to shared folder" OR "Created shared folder" OR "Permanently deleted shared folder" OR "Deleted shared folder" OR "Rename shared folder") $IP_Address $Username

definition.title: Total Count of Notified Password Change Events

search.query: source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Add policy" OR "Edit policy" OR "Delete policy" OR "Update policy users") $IP_Address $Username
source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Add policy" OR "Edit policy" OR "Delete policy" OR "Update policy users") $IP_Address $Username

source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Created LastPass account" OR "Employee account created" OR "Employee account deleted" OR "Employee invited" OR "Employee account requires activation") $IP_Address $Username
source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Rename group" OR "Delete group" OR "Create group" OR "Remove from group" OR "Adding user to group") $IP_Address $Username
source:lastpass service:reporting-events @evt.name:("Rename group" OR "Delete group" OR "Create group" OR "Remove from group" OR "Adding user to group") $IP_Address $Username
